name: Vmind
description: Gemini-3-powered mind-map studio that asks the model to emit a JSON tree with at least 15 nodes and 3+ levels, then renders the topology with JointJS so prompts become shareable diagrams.

name: LastPush
description: Dev-first deployment cockpit that pairs site/domain/billing navigation with wallet balance, activity logs, and deploy buttons so developers ship updates without leaving the dashboard.

name: eGBA Library
description: Chrome-hosted eGBA Library exposes a lightweight EmulatorJS-based GBA emulator with a GitHub download button, localStorage-backed SRAM saves, and feature/installation/structure sections that guide you through loading ROMs and using the embedded controls.

name: NostrLink
description: Secure decentralized messaging front end built with nostr-tools; the UI lets you generate or paste a nsec key, then handle chats, polls, videos, and relay lists across Nostr event types with a minimalist dashboard.
